High Priest Orven:

Hm...

To get to the Cemetery use a teleport in any part of the continent.

Go and kill 300 monsters that are roaming around the Cemetery. Monsters to hunt: Taik Orc Watchman, Grave Guard, Taik Orc Supply Officer, Tairim, Tortured Undead, Spiteful Ghost of Ruins, Soldier of Grief, Cruel Punisher, Roving Soul, Soul of Ruins.
